DOC.brief_summary: This study examines the effects of weight loss and aerobic exercise training on sugar metabolism and other risk factors for heart disease in obese older individuals.
DOC.brief_title: Weight Loss in Diabetic, Older Obese Adults
DOC.criteria: Age > 50 years, Body mass index (BMI) > 27kg/m(2), No prior history of diabetes or coronary disease, Sedentary
